tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PoliticalDiscussionTrends ( 
  researcher_id INT, 
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255), 
  social_media_platform VARCHAR(50), 
  topic_of_interest VARCHAR(100), 
  analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
 researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 researcher_name VARCHAR,
 organization VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE political_discussions (
 discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 topic VARCHAR,
 discussion_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE social_media (
 post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 post_content TEXT,
 post_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SocialMediaPosts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrendAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_topic VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PoliticalDiscussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(50),
    discussion_date DATE,
    post_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES SocialMediaPosts(post_id)
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  research_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  account_created_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE political_posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
  post_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  user_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE hashtags (
  hashtag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hashtag_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE post_hashtags (
  post_id INT,
  hashtag_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (post_id, hashtag_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES political_posts(post_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (hashtag_id) REFERENCES hashtags(hashtag_id)
)
